thread.title: Giants' Cruz does not practice because of calf injury
thread.title_full: Giants' Cruz does not practice because of calf injury

title: Giants' Cruz does not practice because of calf injury
text:
> Sports Giants' Cruz does not practice because of calf injury FILE - In this Aug. 2, 2015 file photo, New York Giants' Victor Cruz throws the ball during a practice at NFL football training camp in East Rutherford, N.J. Cruz is hoping to practice Wednesday, Sept. 30, and play for the first time almost a year when the New York Giants play the Bills in Buffalo on Sunday. (AP Photo/Seth Wenig) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
